# TCPIP协议入门教程（C语言编程网）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/tcpip-xieyi-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/tcpip-xieyi-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install tcpip-xieyi-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
tcpip-xieyi-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g tcpip-xieyi-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang
tcpip-xieyi-rumenjiaocheng-c-yuyan-biancheng-wang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
